messages.content:
bubble popping game where you click to pop bubbles in the bathroom, blue background
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

add the sound effect when a bubble bursts: https://wiki.h4ks.com/images/7/7e/Bubble-pop-283674.mp3
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

make the bubbles gently get repealed move away from the cursor like oil in water
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

when the screen is empty of bubbles re-spawn them all again and play this audio effect while spawning the new bubbles: https://wiki.h4ks.com/images/9/93/Bubble-254777.mp3. Also use it when the game loads the first time
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

when the screen is empty of bubbles print "Me So Clean" and re-spawn the bubble all again
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

make one random bubble only pop by clicking it ten times.
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

add a wave effect in the background everywhere you click but make it more intense when a bubble is popped
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

the effect is not appear nor in the position of the cursor during any screen right click or in the exact place a bubble is considering the swing animation
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

That worked for the bubbles but I also want the effect for any left click in the screen, just less intense. I still dont see it
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

make the ending game text appear in the center of the screen. At the moment it appears over the top and is cropped
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

instead of directly restarting the game in the end. Display a menu to go visit other games at https://games.h4ks.com/
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

when Bibles touch each other or are relatively close make both of them pop in sequence a cascading effec
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

Almost works but the cascading pop effect is displaying in the wrong position when two or more bubbles touch. Currently it is displayed in the top left. Please ensure the wave effect is always in the same position as the bubbles
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
